size-s.$description: This is a small size for icons. Most commonly used for icons inside small buttons and select menu toggles.

size-m.$description: This is a medium size for icons. Most commonly used for icons that sit inside buttons.

size-l.$description: This is a large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.

size-xl.$description: This is a x-large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.

size-xxl.$description: This is a xx-large size for icons. Most commonly used for illustrative purposes.
